reviews.review_msg: Great and helpful professor! It can be a easy course if take with her. Enjoy the research term paper - can choose your own research topic
This prof is very funny and super cute too. Great class.

Dr. Shaw is the BEST instructor in the SA department. She is very engaged and organized during her lectures. I found her class to be very relevant to current issues. Each class is exciting as she makes learning fun! Her assignments are graded fairly with clear rubrics to follow. Her use of Canvas is well organized and she posts ALL lectures.
